teachers.title: Meet Our Teachers
teachers.description: Our experienced and dedicated teachers are here to help you achieve your English learning goals.
teachers.joelBio: Joel is the founder of our school and an experienced EFL teacher. He has a passion for helping students achieve their English learning goals.
teachers.callinBio: Callin is a dedicated EFL teacher with years of experience in teaching English to students of various levels. Her engaging teaching style makes learning fun and effective.
teachers.awadBio: Awad is an enthusiastic, qualified native EFL teacher with a Bachelor's degree in education. He is from Cape Town, South Africa.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.contactSupport: If you can’t find what you’re looking for, please contact support.
faqs.rescheduleClassQuestion: Is it possible to reschedule a class?
faqs.rescheduleClassAnswer: Yes! At least 24 hours before your original scheduled lesson, click the customer support button and send us a WhatsApp message.
faqs.cancelClassQuestion: Can I cancel a class and get a refund?
faqs.cancelClassAnswer: Yes! At least 24 hours before your original scheduled lesson, click the customer support button and send us a WhatsApp message.
faqs.lessonDurationAnswer: Our lessons are 60 minutes long and are held on the Google Meet platform.
faqs.bookLessonChildQuestion: Can I book a lesson for my child who is younger than 13 years old?
faqs.bookLessonChildAnswer: You can book a lesson for your child if he or she is at the A2 level. We have conversation topics suitable for this profile too.
